text:
There are so many delicious-looking
restaurants around the office!

Yeah, I also go out for lunch sometimes.
It's crowded everywhere.

Ah i see...
Umm, any restaurants you recommend...?

Chinese restaurant with
a wide variety of dishes.

The Ramen Restaurant 
with a long line of 
customers.

This restaurant makes a great omelette, and they
have two kinds of sauce, so it's always hard to decide.

Hehe... omurice from a Western-style restaurant,
it looks very authentic and I'm curious about it.

Chinese would be nice too! If we all go
together, we can share and have fun!

Sure, that sounds like fun, and the
price is pretty reasonable...

It takes a while, but it's worth queuing up.
That's a bit of a hurdle, isn't it?

No, I'm a little nervous... But I'd love to
go with everyone next time.
